synopsis.text: High school students Miho and Shouta find themselves on different paths, yet sharing a common goal: passing their college entrance exams. Miho, hailing from an island devoid of cram schools, and Shouta, juggling part-time work in bustling Tokyo, both enroll in Z-Kai's correspondence education courses. Unbeknownst to them, their lives intertwine through their shared pursuit of higher education. Will their dedication and perseverance lead them to the college dreams they aspire to?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
